mapper.delete: DELETE FROM inside_factory WHERE 1 = 1 and id = #{id}
UPDATE inside_factory SET is_del = 1 WHERE 1 = 1 and id = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE inside_factory SET
material_num = #{materialNum},
number_grinding = #{numberGrinding},
tool_type = #{toolType},
approver = #{approver},
repair_state = #{repairState},
is_del = #{isDel},
cutting_tool_code = #{cuttingToolCode},
product_line_equipment_code = #{productLineEquipmentCode},
oprator = #{oprator},
oprator_name = #{opratorName},
create_time = #{createTime},
id = #{id} WHERE 1 = 1 and id = #{id}
